Locale.Value:
1. Wonderful brushwork and vivid paintings! Experience the AI painting function.
It supports generating various styles of beautiful paintings through text description and image upload. Without tedious techniques, AI painting turns your imagination into reality and inspires sincere works of art.

2. AI capability upgrade.
（1）By combining user feedback and the company's increased resource support for AI technology, we continue to optimize AI capabilities to better understand user intentions and generate knowledge outlines and mind map content that meet user needs.
（2）The top navigation bar, based on the original, adds quick access to AI capabilities.
（3）Add the function of AI artwork collection.

3. Add quick image editing tools.
Image adjustment one step ahead, one-click AI image optimization, one-click OCR text extraction, significantly improved efficiency

4. Enhanced Editing Experience
（1）Optimized the dynamic follow effect of the topic background when entering and editing mind maps.
（2）Optimized the automatic layout effect during mind map editing.
（3）Added an edit shortcut bar for quick access to AI capabilities.
（4）Updated and optimized the underlying code and fixed some other known issues
